channel.title: How would I go about doing this?
channel.description: How would I go about adding something like when they kill a NPC they get a point and it saves to their character file (I already have this) now how could I make it so it shows the top 10 if they click the board? I know it would be something like them shitty highscores but with different code so could anyone show the code? I know someone has them. LOL

item.title: How would I go about doing this?
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

^ It’s not 100 Enum errors it’s 100

item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Probably because you are missing a bracket somewhere. Make sure you close off all brackets, and you don’t have a random closing bracket somewhere.

item.title: How would I go about doing this?
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

Ok well I got this code

sendQuest("@bla@"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+ " = @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ " +server.playerHandler.players[i].playerLevel[24]+ "@bla@ Rank @red@" +server.playerHandler.players[i].playerLevel[22], 8147+i);
I want it ONLY to show a rank called granny that is saving into the players text file. Any help there?

Edit: Would this work?

sendQuest(" @whi@Total Lvl:@gre@ " +server.playerHandler.players[i].player.granny+");

Read full topic
item.source: How would I go about doing this?

item.title: How would I go about doing this?
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

He is trying to make his server so that when you kill an NPC, they get a point, and then it transfers over to something similar to a highscore on a forum, so that you could see who has killed the most NPC’s or whatever he is trying to do with it, and make it so that the “highscore” shows the 10 people with the most points.

Read full topic

No I have all that I just need help with sending the frame and loading the top 10 point carriers.
